edupack_tutorial.title: Sample Tutorial, TVB-EduPack v0.1.1
edupack_tutorial.description: In this example tutorial, you'll get a first impression of TVB-EduPack. The tutorial is divided to several parts. These parts are the Steps which you can see in the menu below. The first part is already open and shows you the associated Tasks. Click on the first task to continue.

sub-step.detail: On the right side of the history tab on the left hand side of the Simulator Interface, there is grey button marked with a star. Click it in order to create a new and clean simulation.

finish_constraints.manual: Click here to complete this task manually.

sub-step.detail: Now let's concentrate on the frame in the middle - the Configuration area. First type in the name of the simulation. Below that name field are three buttons - not so important yet, but the first one "Configure Interface" allows you to add / hide specific fields in the parameter setup, and the other two permit the user to adapt and specify parameters for specific nodes of the connectivity matrix.

finish_constraints.manual: Click here to complete this task manually.

sub-step.detail: Welcome to the Tutorial "Set up ypur first simulation". To start right away, make sure that you're in the Simulator Interface of The Virtual Brain - if not, please switch to the Simulator Interface by clicking in the Footer Tab in the lower area of the TVB Interface.

finish_constraints.manual: Click here to complete this task manually.

sub-step.detail: The Simulator Interface is divided into three areas. On the left you can see a history list, with all your simulations from the past within your project - you can copy, reload and create new ones........ .......
